alert.note: Alert for Edgefield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 4:27PM EDT until July 30 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Edgefield County in central South Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 427 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Edgefield County Airport, or 16 miles north of Belvedere, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Edgefield, Johnston, Edgefield County Airport, Trenton, Strom Thurmond High School, Harmony, and Edgefield Federal Correction Institution. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
